titles: A new song, being the Tories tryumph, or, The point well weathered: to a new theatre tune.
notes: A Tory satire on the Whigs.
Verse: "Some say, the papists had a plot ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Political satire, English --  Early works to 1800.
